website_summaries.verdict: The latest upgrade of the 13-inch Apple MacBook Air brings a more powerful Core i5 processor and an astounding 17.5 hours of battery life. It remains our top choice for ultraportable laptops.
pros: More than 17 hours of battery life in testing
cons: Only upgradable at time of order

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping - overall good deal. Wish seller would have been clear that ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping - overall good deal. Wish seller would have been clear that there is no power cord and also no password needed when you first log in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super computer
customer_reviews.text: I'd rate it ten stars if I could. Seller rated it as very good condition. Unit had 2 very faint scratches on the bottom, one faint scratch on the top and the tiniest nick in the display. I would rate it as excellent. Very clean... including inside, which I saw when I upgraded the RAM. Runs great... it is everything I hoped it would be. I am extremely happy. I would buy from this seller again, and in combination with Amazon's fulfillment, is a combination that is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: but I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sure it weighs more than the lastest macbook pros, but it's fast enough and comes with a 500 Gb HD and two USB ports, a firewire port, a thunderbolt port.and an optical drive. Plus the price is far less than newest macbook pros (and from what I've read, the new machines are not receiving enthusiastic reviews). I've used Macs for years but this is my first laptop so maybe I don't have the experience with other laptops to be qualified to do comparisons, but I'm happy with my purchase. And by the way, you can't beat the help and advice that you get from Apple if you run into a problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. It is easy to carry and use in different settings. I purchased it to primarily write my memoirs. I realized that for some of the things I described were so long ago, my grandchildren would have no idea what I was talking about. So I use google to search for pictures of the object or thing I'm describing. Since then, I've used it for other things. It's proving to be more useful than I had originally thought.
customer_reviews.author: L. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Ready to go out of the box. Brand new, in Apple packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great one while you can.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a replacement for my wife's 2009 MBP. Works flawlessly. I had to get a MBP with an optical drive and with the added feature of a 500G HD it was the one to get. The fact that it was at at a very good price made this a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Packy57

customer_reviews.title: Good Decision to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my decision to buy this laptop. I am not afraid to open my laptop to upgrade memory, hard drive and battery when I want, and the more recent Apple laptops do not allow you to do any user upgrades. Since i purchased this laptop I have replaced my hard drive with an SSD ( fairly easy to do with DIY video ) and I installed the maximum memory immediately upon receiving it. I also like the DVD player and having connectors that Apple has discontinued. It's heavy, yes. But it's a trade off I can live with. I don't know how much longer these discontinued models will be around so don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Reibman

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a refurbished item, but to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a refurbished item, but to my surprise it was 2015 manufacture of the 2012 model. Upgraded to 16GB Ram and I have a screaming brand new machine! It took a while to encrypt the drive (FileVault) and update to Sierra, but migrated using a Thunderbolt cable and within an hour of transfer it was a complete clone of my previous system!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Doud

customer_reviews.title: Also it ran really bad. This is a bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is not new. Its dated 2012. But it is priced new. Also it ran really bad. This is a bad buy. I had to return. Seller did promptly refund which is good. So seller gets 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KdKazaam

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop and it looked new when it came. As I started using it, there were several glitches. The headphone jack sometimes didn't work, the safari icon usually did not work, many apps froze a lot, the speakers were not loud at all, and the charger stopped working randomly. I do not think this was a new computer. Electronic Seed is not an authorized Apple seller even though it is fulfilled by Amazon. Luckily Amazon is able to refund me for this computer but I would advise against this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro rocks
customer_reviews.text: I just received this laptop but so far so good. The price was right and Apple does make some great computers.
customer_reviews.author: Kurts Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most laggy computer we ever owned. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most laggy computer we ever owned. The power adapter has already failed. The battery drains extremely fast. The previous owner's music CD (defective copy of Jazz) was in the CD drive, so I'm not sure how much work was put into checking it out before going on the market. Likely the first and last computer we buy used. I would give it one star, but the computer does work. If it had been cheaper I could deemed it a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: dude pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: This item exceeded my expectations, for $560 I wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This item exceeded my expectations, for $560 I wasn't expecting greatness. The outside had a minor scratch, but the inside is flawless. Bought it from esales connect, came on time and in lots of bubble wrap:)
customer_reviews.author: Shane V.

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is great. I love all the ports that are included
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I gave 4 stars is because I really am a PC person when it comes down to it. I miss windows 7, how PC's function, and the bang for your buck from PC's. However, if you are a MAC person - I would say 6 stars. This laptop is great. I love all the ports that are included. This is not too heavy. It is nice how this laptop pairs with my iphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: IT ACTUALLY WORKS LMAO
customer_reviews.text: Holy s*** it actually works!! I was honestly shocked because the price was so much lowers than Apple's but it works perfectly, it's like a dream man. Def recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black screen of death after only 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: This computer stopped working after 8 months and there is no warranty after 90 days. He basically said too bad- have the Apple store fix it which means I will be so long more money into this. The screen went black and the charge cord didn’t communicate with the computer. Even with a new Apple cord at the Apple store it still won’t charge.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Merchandise information of manufacturing location not disclosed
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when you buy Apple products from them. We purchased an Apple MacBook Pro had a problem with it it was two weeks past the warranty and of course they wouldn't cover anything. We took it to an Apple store and they said this apple was manufactured to go to India and Canada was not even to be sold in the United States and had we had a problem with it even before Apple would not have covered it. Cost is $1,000 for an extra hundred we could have bought it at the Apple Store
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Horrible purchase. Extremely slow computer. It takes 5 min or longer to open any files if it opens them at all. Freezes constantly. Every simple operation takes a long time. It is programmed to save everything on your Cloud automatically; our IT person said that's very weird, and he has not been able to override it. The Cloud gets full very quickly, and you are forced to pay money to upgrade it or you will get a constant annoying reminder that slows down the computer even further. The problems started from the day of purchase. Completely unusable and a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: feufgeugf

customer_reviews.title: Very professional
customer_reviews.text: Almost no cosmetic damages, works good and fast, only issue is it didn't come with latest OS😭 It came with OS X Yosemite, no issue though, just have to update to latest OS, bought mine referbed, and it has 8gb ram already installed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Canington

customer_reviews.title: I love my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a MacBook. Initially I shopped around locally here in Nigeria but prices were outrageous. That was when I decided to shop online at Amazon.com, it has paid off. My MacBook Pro is new and works perfectly as advertised. It a brand new experience for me because I've used PC's all my life.
customer_reviews.author: Exquisitetopia

customer_reviews.title: Love having the CD/DVD Drive as well as all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Brand New, Sealed In Box, Never Used Apple 13 Inch MAcBook Pro (MD101LL/A). Came with all original Apple accessories. Was able to update to macOS High Sierra 10.13.3 with no issues. Love having the CD/DVD Drive as well as all the ports without having to get an extra accessory.
customer_reviews.author: LKNG

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected I went ahead and dropped 2 8gb crucial memory cards in it to take it from 4gb ram to 16 great machine
customer_reviews.author: daniel belson

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and nice to be able to get this Mac which Apple ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and nice to be able to get this Mac which Apple no longer sells. Needed to upgrade the Ram (only 4GB) as it was super slow out of the box, but I also had loaded my entire hard drive from my old Mac onto it. Once the new 16GB RAM was in- no more spinning wheel :-). Pretty happy Mac girl here!
customer_reviews.author: Windsor Easley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived first thing this morning and I am pleasantly surprised with its condition. It looks almost new and runs fast and problem free. Great extras on the system that are definitely helpful and the 10GB of memory doesn't hurt either! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond DeMartini

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded easily to Sierra
customer_reviews.text: Sealed new unit in original carton, cellophane, etc... works perfectly. Upgraded easily to Sierra.
customer_reviews.author: gilbert stock

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase! I've had this macbook for a couple weeks now and have been impressed. It came brand new and after some updates (had to be patient lol) its been amazing. Would recommend to anyone, planning on getting another one for my wife. Also planning on upgrading the ram even though it runs very well I figured it can't hurt, but even after upgrading the ram you can't beat this deal I've seen used one's for the same or more.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy drebenstedt

customer_reviews.title: Regression
customer_reviews.text: I have a MacBook Pro from 6 years ago that works far better than the current version. Its like Mac purposely made their latest laptop inferior. I only bought the latest version because a program I needed would not load on my old computer. My new laptop constantly crashes and is very slow. I hope Mac loses the computer race.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Noser ll

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 year, over $500 to fix, Apple unwilling to provide any accomodations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer new 1 year ago. 7 days after the warranty expired the computer stopped turning on. I brought it into an Apple Store where they told me the logic board needed to be replaced for $500. No accommodations were made despite the computer being 1 year old and just barely past the warranty. I think if you spend $1000 on a computer it should last a lot longer than 1 year or a company should fix the error.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stegeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought mine refurbished and it is exactly as described. Thanks, eSales Connect :)
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband! Took him a bit to get used to because he had been using a HP product. But he loves it now!
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: ... it now she just loves it for school and fun. Came with so many apps
customer_reviews.text: My daughter won't let me use it now she just loves it for school and fun. Came with so many apps... Great computer, DvD port and burner, USB and HDMI options SD drive
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: but I couldnt be happier. Condition was great and price was fair
customer_reviews.text: Was a little wary of buying a used laptop on Amazon, but I couldnt be happier. Condition was great and price was fair. Laptop needed to be reformatted because software was a little wonky, but thats not surprising. My daughters first computer was well worth it. I'll upgrade it with an SSD and more ram ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W. Griffiths Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but I didn't know it was a 2014 ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great, but I didn't know it was a 2014 model. I thought it was last years model. That is the only problem I have with it. I bought it on the Amazon store card that it give me 1 year interest free. That's great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny OBrian

customer_reviews.title: NOT a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: SADLY I had issues with the hard drive and had to send it back for repair. ONLY had it two weeks. Won't boot up and I have several programs for my job on it...Not a happy camper...Will update this review when I have it returned.
customer_reviews.author: CALBEAR

customer_reviews.title: I'm Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy that my new MacBook Pro really is brand new! I already have one that I bought back in 2010 and I really, really like it and I wanted to have another one just like it since Apple has eliminated the CD Drive in the new Mac's. Now I have another one which I will set aside and use when my 2010 model finally konks out.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was like new and when something went wrong with the computer
customer_reviews.text: It was like new and when something went wrong with the computer.... They were very helpful and sent me a better and more storage computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a computer that was so delightful to use. Its price was reasonable and well worth paying. I received it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ward

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Looks in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2! So far so good! One Looks in great condition, slightly high on battery cycle but it was a great price. The other had a decent ding on the bottom but battery cycle super low at 168! Got skins for both so not too worried about the ding... Still checking all systems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It still works amazing, the battery life is still great
customer_reviews.text: This is totally worth the money. There are some scratches on the cover, but honestly, it doesn’t bother me (and it was stated when I purchased it). It still works amazing, the battery life is still great. For almost 1k less than a new MacBook Pro, it’s the perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Severson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE with this MacBook!!! I have had it for a few months now and have not encountered a single problem with it. I was also very pleased to find a letter and card from the company I purchased from letting me know if I should have any problems whatsoever, to give them a call and they would gladly take care of it or refund me. Super happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea N.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: It came BRAND SPANKING NEW and I felt like a kid at Christmas. Works like a charm so far and just so excited to have a functioning and fast laptop again after using my last one for over 7 years!
customer_reviews.author: TheBlogAbroad

customer_reviews.title: Love this mac!
customer_reviews.text: This macbook pro was an excellent find. Great price on an older, but new MacBook Pro. Perfect for my non-gaming needs!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Talbot

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can upgrade the ram and hard drive ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new mac and I fear change. This was the closest I could find to my old mac. I like that I can upgrade the ram and hard drive to SSD myself.
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: It looked quite great. Started up fast and did its usual work ...
customer_reviews.text: System was clean and had minor signs of previous use. It looked quite great. Started up fast and did its usual work with effectiveness. It is fast enough...but not that fast when certain graphics were employed. It is quite adequate for its use. Sound quality is not that great but acceptable. Battery life sucks. Besides battery life it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Azzard Comrie

customer_reviews.title: Buy from someone else
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dead battery and the merchant refused to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah kish

customer_reviews.title: I got it for my daughter and she's overjoyed with it
customer_reviews.text: Abolutely!, I got it for my daughter and she's overjoyed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Conklin

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift and then it did not work very disappointed in the seller who would not
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and then it did not work very disappointed in the seller who would not assist
customer_reviews.author: Vicki V.

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I wanted. An old school ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. An old school mac from 2012. I got this item because it came with multiple ports and a dvd player. This product arrived in a timely manner and was well packed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCatMom

customer_reviews.title: Its a Macbook Pro.  What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.text: Its a Macbook Pro. What else is there to say? I am a huge fan of the Apple laptop products and have been for a couple of years now. I have always been a PC guy but about 2 years ago, I started back to school and wanted to give Apple a try. I have been hooked ever since. This brings me to this review. I purchased my wife this Macbook Pro and she loves it just as much as I love mine. Great product with even better customer service and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: a few dents a line of semi dead pixels. but it's the love of my life.
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. it came a little dented but what can I saw it's a used laptop. also writing this review on the laptop now. it also has a few semi dead pixels but unless I'm watching something and the screen is dark I would's notice.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It met 100% of our expectations and there were zero problems. The price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s last me a very long time. Did run into a few software problems but nothing that couldn’t be handled. Unlike the new MacBooks I love this one because I can remove and replace parts.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Vo

customer_reviews.title: Fast processing and the battery can last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is really fast and has been easy to use. It is my first Apple product and I have been pleased with it. The reason I purchased this one was because it is mobile and has the DVD-ROM, plus I am learning the Mac OS. The battery lasts a long time (8 + hours) and if I don't use it and keep it in standby mode, the battery charge can last for days. My only negative, it came with a different country's power adapter. No big deal, I just ended up purchasing a US power adapter at an electronics store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second MacBook Pro. It looks great—no ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second MacBook Pro. It looks great—no scratches or dings. It seems to run a little slow, especially with Microsoft Suite. Texas Mac Repair is very responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: KJH

customer_reviews.title: 100% awesome really glad I got this the wife really loves ...
customer_reviews.text: 100% awesome really glad I got this the wife really loves it I mean it was used from a third-party seller but it worked out just fine for her.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: ... about January 2017 and wasn’t expecting much which is good because I got crap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used about January 2017 and wasn’t expecting much which is good because I got crap. There was a dent on the body, no charger in the box, and for no reason it stopped working. Stellar deal.
customer_reviews.author: Starburst

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my new computer 5 days ago! So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: this affordable refurbished model works LIKE new!
customer_reviews.text: My MacBook Pro works perfectly! Needed a reliable, powerful computer but could not afford NEW one... this affordable refurbished model works LIKE new!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mostly perfect. The only extra I needed to purchase was a HD adapter.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. Bought it refurbished from tech savvy with all kinds of upgrades and additional software. No scratches on the outside and works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Right for me
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook is all it is cracked up to be and more. I am so happy I made this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Williamson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!
customer_reviews.text: Love it my new Mac computer. I'm glad I don't have to deal with crappy windows computer anymore where it lags a lot when editing a video on a software. I recommend Mac computers for those video editors or Photographers.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my grandaughter's graduation present. She loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Laptop was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Got the product with a bad memory module and the seller showed little emotion to my issues. All in all. I’ll never by from that sell ever again.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for: an older Mac ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for: an older Mac that still had all the ports. Maybe I'm too much 20th century but I need my ports.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fiencke

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a refurbished laptop, but it arrived, everything seems to work well so far, easy to set up, will let you know if anything changes. Very satisfied for now.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Met all my expectations but my favorite software needed a newer computer
customer_reviews.text: Met all my expectations but my favorite software needed a newer computer, so maybe in a year or so I'll invest in the newest edition.

customer_reviews.title: My first apple and I highly recommend it if you need a small work computer
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in July and recently upgraded the ram to 16gb and replaced the hard drive with a 1tb sshd drive. It is my go to computer. My first apple and I highly recommend it if you need a small work computer. I thought getting used to a different operating system would be difficult. Thanks to youtube it is a breeze. There are how to's on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T. Wheeler Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this macbook! I have always owned PCs but used a Mac in college years ago while taking some graphic design classes. I am going back to school and need a reliable hassle free computer. So far this really fits the bill!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great machine... everything works flawlessly and came brand new. Worked straight out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer a few years ago and it has not failed me yet. i bought this to get me through college and grad school and it did just that. such a wonderful product.

customer_reviews.text: Case was cracked when I received it; however, I think it was a good buy. I have never used a Mac before, and still familiarizing myself with operating system.

customer_reviews.title: Other than a couple scratches on the top it is in very good condition. Everything operates as it should and for ...
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook Pro exceeded my expectations. Other than a couple scratches on the top it is in very good condition. Everything operates as it should and for the money it is a great buy! I would recommend purchasing one of these MacBooks.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: Pristine condition. Flawless functioning! Saved a bundle and I'd buy from pacificmacs again if I need an additional Mac!

customer_reviews.title: Computer works like new, transferring data from old MacBook extremely difficult
customer_reviews.text: Computer works like new, transferring data from old MacBook extremely difficult , a year later and still not complete. Apple needs to take a look at compatibility between old and new computers

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought in life new condition, looked brand new!

I am here with a functional "NEW" computer with all of my stuff recovered from my water damaged 15 in Pro. Lol @ my life...and that repair man man man man...

customer_reviews.title: Not a good refurbish job I!!
customer_reviews.text: It was not good at all. I use Facebook and Farmtown a lot, well that was so blurred could not use it. Therefore, took it to Apple repair and changed from Google to Firefox and that was supposed to work, but did not. So, put it back in the box and giving it to my son as he does not do Farming at all and should work for his purposes in his business, I hope. Otherwise money out the window on that purchase. so not happy with the purchase at all.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great services thank you so much ^_^

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed in the product. I had no additional softwares added and the hard drive still crashed after only having it for a year. Would not recommend. Also I was told Apple considers this a “legacy” model so I was not able to get it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Paxson

customer_reviews.title: runs good, True to the sellers description light stretch but ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems, runs good, True to the sellers description light stretch but looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I always Mac's but I'm so impressed with the right laptop at the right price
customer_reviews.author: Joy B

customer_reviews.title: save money buy a new one!
customer_reviews.text: was not that impressed. i could only use for a couple months and then it died and would not turn on. we got it checked and they said the battery had water damage. when it did “work” the keyboard and pad would often stall and not work, the screen would glitch, the computer over all was very slow.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Shea

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably slow computer
customer_reviews.text: Last time I'm ever buying an apple product from a retailer that's NOT Apple. The computer is freaking slow even though it's "new." It's most likely refurbished, but without any real improvements. I would advise people to spend that extra $100 to buy a mac from an actual Apple store. At least they have warranty and free returns if you are not happy with your product.
customer_reviews.author: YTM

customer_reviews.title: Will not boot/start up, defective.
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook Pro started having issues booting up a week after I got it, but would eventually boot(start) after many tries. Now after 3 weeks it will not boot(start) at all. I am returning it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Would not ever consider purchasing or using any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ingrid A. Kleinfelter

customer_reviews.title: Love this computer
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer ! It"s Fast. Also Love the feature of the Lighted Keyboard. It helps me a lot. Came brand New in Apple Orig. Box. Have it 2 weeks and no problem's. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not DOA, wish it had been...
customer_reviews.text: First one was clearly brand new in Apple's original packaging -- but after spending the time needed to set it up, it soon failed to communicate with outboard display and then started acting flaky in lots of ways. Will try another, if it's bad, it'll go back too before I go to a different vendor. I like this model, newer models are light but are stupid light on features.
customer_reviews.author: Golfcrackerjack

customer_reviews.title: Truly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Truly Awesome. Delivery on time. Came in original Apple Box. Liked it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. My battery wasn't working so they send me a new one. Now it's working fine
customer_reviews.author: shaquan maxey
